alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 16 at 8:32PM MST until November 17 at 3:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches, with higher amounts possible from Lead to Cheyenne Crossing and O`Neill Pass. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Black Hills. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
